title: I cannot see the text messages that are coming to me or when somebody is texting
content: I need help trying to figure out why when I text somebody I can't receive my text I can't see it but they can see it and it's the opposite when somebody's texting me I can see it on the top of my screen but as soon as I click on the person to have a conversation with them I can't see the text message that they sent to me yes
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
